itunes:title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 3
title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 3
description: Proverbs 4:23 says, “Be careful how you think; your life is shaped by your thoughts” (GNT). Your circumstances and consciousness have shaped who you are. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches how the Bible says the way we respond to our circumstances and the thoughts we choose to believe will shape our lives.
